SourceProxy.name: NetDmfReader
SourceProxy.label: NETDMF Reader

Documentation.long_help: Read NetDMF (Networking Data Model and Format) files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The NetDMF reader reads files in NetDMF format. The expected file extension is .netdmf. Metadata is stored in the NetDMF file using an XML format, and large attribute arrays are stored in a corresponding HDF5 file. The output may be a directed graph or undirectedgraph.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the NetDMF reader.
